story.book

Class StoryInfoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.LocalEditingController
      • story.book.StoryInfoController

  • public class StoryInfoController
extends LocalEditingController
    Controller responsible for creating, editing, displaying the StoryInfo of the current Story for the StoryInfoActivity and EditStoryInformationActivity.
    Author:
    Vina Nguyen
